name: Neocron
description:
Neocron is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by Reakktor Media. It came out on 01-06-2003. CDV Software published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Neocron on PC.
It was directed by Martin J. Schwiezer. It was scored by Ian Boddy, Max Corbacho and Steve Roach.
